Animator_Earth.NAME: Earth
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of turn, gain #b
damage randomly split amongst ALL enemies. NL After #b
turns have passed, automatically #yEvoke this Orb.

Animator_Fire.NAME: Fire
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of turn, apply #b
#yBurning to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Apply #b
